storyInfo:
In the midst of the Ceremony, Enciodes points a finger at the other two clans' dishonest schemes.
The masses stand on Enciodes's side, and by Sharp's aid, the heads of the other two clans flee in disgrace.

attributes.content: What? Sir Enciodes was attacked in the mountains yesterday?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Huh? Is that true?
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: Of course it's true. Sir Arctosz had General Gulo rush people over to report to the Great Elder.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: The other nephew of my third uncle came back with General Gulo.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: They arrived just now, and I heard the news from him.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: What a good lad. Now that's some big news!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Heh!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: But, who would be so foolhardy as to attack Sir Enciodes? On his way to the Holy Hunt, no less!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: Do you think it could've been a Tschäggättä?
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: How the hell could've it been a Tschäggättä? Didn't we already say a person did it?
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: If you ask me, it must've been the doing of the Paleroches or the Browntails.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: They tried so hard to suppress the Silverashes, saying something about how Sir Enciodes had trampled upon our teachings.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: But who knows, maybe they were really after the Silverash clan's land.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: I wouldn't go around making spurious claims like that.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Spurious? Do you have any idea how much Silverash land the Browntail clan gobbled up after Sir Enciodes left Kjerag to study abroad?
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: Now that Sir Enciodes has had a change of heart and took the initiative to show favor to the Saintess, the other two clans are panicking because they no longer have an excuse to keep the Silverashes down.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Wh-Who do you belong to?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: I'm with the Browntail clan. So what?
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: You're a Browntail? How can you say those things about your own clan?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Because I've been working down in the valley for so long, I honestly feel that Sir Enciodes has been wronged!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes has brought so many good things to Kjerag, but has been kept down in the Tri-Clan Council.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: Even now after he has offered to return to the government and taken the initiative to repair his relationship with the Vine-Bear Court and the Saintess, look how they treat him.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: Even if you're a Paleroche, does that not make your conscience ache?
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: You have a point...
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: That's right. No matter what the circumstances are, an attack on Sir Enciodes is simply going too far.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: Besides, to do it during a ceremony as important as the Holy Hunt is also a grave insult to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Exactly! No matter what the facts are regarding this situation, there must be some kind of explanation!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: You said it.
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: That's right, the perpetrator must be found!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: What's wrong? Didn't sleep well last night? You don't look so good.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: Enciodes ended up running into trouble after all.

attributes.content: Mm. Word of it has spread, and everyone's talking about.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I can see that many people are already demanding an explanation for this matter.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Judging from the look on your face, did you not expect this at all?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: It's precisely because I DID expect it.

attributes.content: Huh? Then what's got you in a twist?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Gnosis doesn't see eye to eye with Enciodes, and he's been plotting to overthrow him since they parted ways.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You didn't think Enciodes would leave himself so open, nor did you want to interfere in the affairs of the three clans, so you came to the ceremony as a guest.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I'm just talking about superficial appearances here. From that angle, that is how the situation seems, right?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: Everyone has a skewed understanding of the situation.;Not necessarily.

attributes.content: I don't have a clue what goes on in that head of yours all day.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But I feel like you've infected me into enjoying thinking about these things, so let's do just that.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Hmm... Since Enciodes used to be good friends with Gnosis and we know the latter to be a crafty man, he must've been prepared for Gnosis's betrayal from the very beginning.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But he was attacked anyway, and it became a pretty big deal...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: In other words, he engineered this situation to become more sympathetic in the eyes of the public?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But, what exactly does this accomplish?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Right now, the Holy Hunt party should be on its way back.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Shortly, the Grand Ceremony come to its final ritual, including the ceremonial crowning of the Saintess.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: If he can catch the perpetrator at the ceremony, that'll increase people's faith in Enciodes... but that's it, right?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: What would that be?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: It's just a possibility.;You'll find out soon enough.

attributes.content: The Saintess shot and killed the prey herself during the Holy Hunt?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: And news of the attack on Enciodes has already spread among the people.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Elder B

attributes.content: Not only that, but a number of people are demanding that the perpetrator be punished before the coronation ceremony.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: To injure a countryman during the Holy Hunt is to gravely disrespect Kjeragandr. Of course this deserves punishment!
attributes.name: Elder C

attributes.content: But, this is still the Saintess's coronation ceremony.
attributes.name: Elder B

attributes.content: Both of you bring up good points... Great Elder, your judgment?
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: Given Enciodes's superb abilities, there is little chance that the mastermind behind this will not be sniffed out, regardless of who it is––
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: If only things were that simple.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Please do explain, Great Elder.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: The Saintess's behavior has gone increasingly out-of-line, yet Enciodes's response has been quite uncharacteristic.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: What are those siblings planning?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: What does the Great Elder mean by 'those siblings?'
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: No, there is no possibility of any collusion between the two.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: But perhaps, this is the Silverash blood that runs through their veins––
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Everyone, the Elders, the Great Elder, and the Saintess's teams are about to arrive.
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Enough. Let's go to meet the Saintess.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Hurry, it's the Holy Hunt party!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Look, Sir Enciodes's wounds have been bandaged!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: The rumors were true after all!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: Great Saintess, please deliver justice for Sir Enciodes!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Find the perpetrator who sabotaged the Holy Hunt!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: Matriarch Ratatos and Sir Arctosz appear ill at ease.
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble A

attributes.content: Might they be connected in some way to this incident?
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble B

attributes.content: The Great Elder is here!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: The Vine-Bear Court must uphold justice for Sir Enciodes!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: We won't accept this ceremony if you just try to sweep things under the rug and move on!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: My friends, I am very grateful for your concern.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Though the perpetrator has not been found yet, it is only a matter of time.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: For now, let us first prioritize the ceremony.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What say you, Saintess?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As Sir Enciodes is so faithful to Kjeragandr, I have no objections.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Then, children of Kjeragandr, know that this year's ceremony holds a different meaning.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: The proposal by the head of the Silverash clan, Enciodes, to have the Saintess restored to power passed the previous Tri-Clan Council, and this was announced throughout our territory.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: And today, on the day of Kjerag's grandest celebration, we hold the coronation ceremony for the Saintess.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: This will also be the last ceremony that I preside over.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Kjeragandr gave Her own flesh to the Paleroche clan, making the land fertile so that the people of Kjerag would go hungry no longer.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Valais.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Sir.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I am a researcher. Even should I lie, I would never lie about my research.
You may distrust the results of my analysis, yet you still hold onto my sample from back then.
You can use it as an experiment, to verify the things that I said.
Or, are you ready to accept this 'truth?'
Do you truly believe that your father died for 'blaspheming Kjeragandr?'
Valais respectfully brings forth a cup of wine.
This cup represents a bountiful harvest.
I offer this wine made from nourishing grain to Kjeragandr, so that we may be blessed with a bountiful harvest next year.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The Great Elder receives the wine and drinks it in one gulp.
As head of the Paleroche clan, I, Arctosz Paleroche, pay the highest tribute to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Your prayers will surely reach Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjeragandr gave Her own hide to the Browntail clan, making the forests lush and full of beast-life so that the people of Kjerag would no longer succumb to the cold.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Yucatan.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Matriarch.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Yucatan respectfully brings forth a scarf.
This scarf represents comfort and good health.
I offer this cloth knit from warming fur to Kjeragandr, so that we may be blessed with comfort and good health next year.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The Great Elder takes the scarf and drapes it across the Saintess.
As head of the Browntail clan, I, Ratatos Browntail, pay the highest tribute to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Your prayers will surely reach Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Finally, Kjeragandr gave Her own bones to the Silverash clan, making the mountains rich with metal so that the people of Kjerag could forge tools and weapons.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Matterhorn respectfully brings forth a small knife.
This small knife represents peace.
I offer this weapon of refined ore to Kjeragandr, so that we may be blessed with peace next year.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Great Elder takes the knife and hands it to the Saintess with both hands.
As head of the Silverash clan, I, Enciodes Silverash, pay the highest tribute to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Your prayers will surely reach Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Next––
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Master, the perpetrator has been found.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Great Elder, now that the perpetrator has been found, I know not whether to continue the ceremony or interrogate the perpetrator.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This perpetrator must be brought to justice!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: That's right! The perpetrator must be punished!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: Since the people worry about this matter, bring the perpetrator.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: (Monch?!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (What's going on? Why is Monch in custody? D-Does this have something to do with the assassination attempt?!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Dammit, that idiot!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Wait, Rus, what are you doing?!)
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Assassin who dares disrupt the Holy Hunt, state your name.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Why... *could* *cough*... would you seek to take Sir Enciodes's life?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I kill what needs to die.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Assassin, keeping your mouth shut will not spare your life.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Your sacrilege against Kjeragandr during a sacred ceremony is a sin that must be punished accordingly.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Know that if you persist, then by the Commandments, I can order your execution on the spot!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Fine. Then you shall be dealt with according to the Commandments.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Even if you choose not to speak, your identity will not be difficult to uncover.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Wait, hold on!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sciurus!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Yucatan, what are you doing? Let go of me!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Monch is one of my people! I won't let you hurt her!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Is this true, Sciurus?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: ...Sciurus! You get back here this instant!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: This isn't the time or place to be fooling around. Yucatan, get your wife under control!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: ...Rus, you don't understand the situation. Let's not make a scene here, alright?
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Come, over here, by me.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: What am I not understanding? And I am not making a scene!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: They're all like that. If I didn't speak up, they would've condemned Monch as an assassin!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Silence!!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Ratatos, I...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Looks like that saves us the trouble of identifying the assassin.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Detain Sciurus.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: W-Wait, why are you arresting me?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I'm telling you, I never had Monch do anything of the sort! Someone must be trying to frame us!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Great Elder, surely it cannot be appropriate to use force against a member of the Browntail clan solely due to the words of an insignificant person who knows nothing of the situation.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: As you can see, my stupid little sister could not possibly seek to assassinate Sir Enciodes, for she clearly lacks the brain cells to do so.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Hey, what are you trying to say?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I told you to shut up!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: (...Sciurus, know your place.)
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What, you mean to say that your sister has been deceived, Ratotos? Do you not find something unusual about that?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Very perceptive, Great Elder.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Enciodes... *cough*... What do you think?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Ratatos has always treated me kindly. and I have always trusted her. Even if we have our differences, I believe she would not resort to such drastic measures.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ratatos, I have no reason to believe you to be of so little faith as to behave in such a manner during a celebration of Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: While my well-being is of little consequence, this disrespect to Kjeragandr cannot be tolerated.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What do you mean by that?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Now that we know that the perpetrator is a member of the Browntail clan, no one will believe the empty rhetoric that the Browntails have nothing to do with this matter.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Without providing some concrete evidence, or turning over the real perpetrator, even if I am willing to turn the other cheek... I'm afraid that the house of Browntail will be hard-pressed to convince the public.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ratatos feels that she can understand the man's meaning, but the buzzing of those words inside her ears... is far too thunderous to bear.
The entire ceremony is awash with turmoil. She has never once felt the gaze of the surrounding people in such a way before - full of distrust and hostility, like barbs in her back.
Sciurus also seems to be saying something to her, and not in her usual sharp shouts, her lips are silently quivering.
Ratatos can tell from a glance what her voiceless words are. In the past, the two of them played similar tricks without the notice of adults.
Her sister says:
'But, I just wanted to do something for the Browntail clan!'
Great Elder, what is your opinion?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: *cough*... Your words ring true, Enciodes... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Great Elder, is there something wrong?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm fine... *gurgle*...
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Great Elder, what's happening?!
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: There's some green liquid coming from the Great Elder's lips... He's been poisoned!
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Someone poisoned the Great Elder!
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Let me see.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Stay back, Saintess! There may be other poison!
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: I'm not afraid.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: No... the poison is too potent and is suppressing my healing Arts. I can only barely maintain the Great Elder's life for a while.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Who would poison the Great Elder?! And, when...
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Wine! It must've been that cup of wine that Arctosz offered to the Great Elder!
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Bring the cup!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: H-Here it is!
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Without a doubt... there are traces of poison.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: That's impossible!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: ...So that's your game.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Arctosz, I never could've imagined that you would dare poison the Great Elder in your bid to take over Kjerag!
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What?! What reason would I possibly have to poison the Great Elder?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hmph. The Paleroche clan has always been on good terms with the Vine-Bear Court, but you leveraged this relationship to gain many privileges throughout Kjerag. The people gathered here are all witnesses to that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Over these years, you have used this privilege to suppress me, something I endure to this day. You have all seen this with your own eyes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And now, even as I have compromised by proposing to return temporal power to the Saintess, you still have to terrorize the house of Silverash.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Once the Saintess holds all the power and the three clans are equal under her leadership, will the Paleroche clan still enjoy its privileges as it does now?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Perhaps because the Great Elder was no longer willing to support you, you then chose to contact Madame Sciurus, plotting the scheme unfolding before our very eyes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Madame Sciurus was responsible for assassinating me, you would poison the Great Elder, and the two of you would take advantage of the situation to seize power in Kjerag... Not a bad plan, Arctosz.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You dare slander me, Enciodes!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Slander?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It is a fact that your clan is on good terms with the Vine-Bear Court. It is a fact that the Browntail clan is now allied with yours. It is a fact that the Elders agreed to return temporal power to the Saintess.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And as of now, it is a fact that you poisoned the Great Elder.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I would ask all of you present to pass judgment – am I the one who slanders, or is Arctosz the one who deceives?!
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But... Sir Arctosz isn't that kind of person...
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes was injured during the Holy Hunt, and a Browntail was responsible. Now, Arctosz poisoned the Great Elder. What is there to doubt?
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: I can't believe I had such a wrong impression of Arctosz! I never thought he was faking his piety all these years!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: ...I refuse to believe it!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Wake up already!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: Pin down the murderer and Madame Sciurus.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Right away.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Get your hands off me, you bastard!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sciurus!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Matriarch...!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Wait––
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Guh...
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Ice Arts, and from such a long range? Could it be––
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Who is it?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble A

attributes.content: Look over there!
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble B

attributes.content: Warriors, it's time to rescue your clan leader.
That's... Gnosis! Why is he here, and, why are the Browntails with him?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble A

attributes.content: I haven't heard from him since he was blacklisted from Karlan Trade. From the looks of things, he's defected to the Browntail clan?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble B

attributes.content: Enciodes, you've gone to such great lengths to paint yourself as some pious victim, making your high-and-mighty proclamations atop that stage of yours. Have you no sense of shame?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I was wondering where you were hiding, Gnosis. Turns out you fell in with Ratatos.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hiding? No, I've been biding my time for this moment.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ratatos, what are you hesitating for?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gnosis, you––
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Take a good look at the people around you, and the distrust they harbor for you in their eyes!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ratatos has betrayed Kjeragandr! She must be punished!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian A

attributes.content: Arctosz, I thought better of you!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian B

attributes.content: Strike them down, Sir Enciodes! Strike them down!!
attributes.name: Kjerag Civilian C

attributes.content: Get a good look at your sister. Enciodes is about to take her away!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Let go! Let go of me!!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Don't you dare hurt my wife!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Argh...
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Yucatan!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sciurus! Yucatan!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Now is your last chance.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Enciodes said that he trusted you. But did he ever actually trust you?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You should've seen through this long ago. He's just forcing you to make a decision. But do you really think you can protect your Browntail clan simply by turning over the 'assassin' that he wants?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Look around you. See how the people are looking at you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Do you have any idea what will become of your clans should Enciodes take over Kjerag?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Matriarch!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Ratatos, don't tell me that you intend to protect neither your clan nor your lands, and instead will simply relinquish your public image and privileges?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If you still choose to do nothing, even at this point...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Then allow me to help you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gnosis turns to look at Enciodes.
Ice-blue Arts condense in the palm of his hand, but Enciodes remains unfazed.
Gnosis, you disappoint me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What a coincidence, Enciodes. I was just thinking the same thing.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: ––Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Guh...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: As you should know, these Arts are nothing to me.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Alright, don't waste my time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Let's put you down, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: How pathetic.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Pathetic?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Even if you strike me down here today, it won't do you any good.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You may be able to stop one person, or even a hundred people. But can you stop a thousand? Ten thousand?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Look behind me.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The flames have been lit.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Grr.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Arctosz.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Do you believe me, or Enciodes?!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I don't trust either of you!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Then you should at least know very clearly now, who the real enemy is!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Browntail clan warriors, prepare for battle!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: First, we rescue Sciurus. Then, bring Enciodes to me!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Yes, Matriarch!
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Fy faen... Paleroche warriors, in formation!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Take down the traitor! Expose to the masses that Enciodes is the real traitor!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Get Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You don't need me?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I don't.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Take care of the Great Elder and the Saintess.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Right away.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Weiss.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Bring me Arctosz and Ratatos.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Try to avoid taking any lives. Now isn't the time for that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It shall be done.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.options: The other possibility seems to have been the correct one.

attributes.content: So what was all of that?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: That... was all planned by Enciodes from the very beginning.

attributes.content: Didn't we know that all along?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: I mean, including Gnosis showing up.

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Do you mean that––
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Your orders, Doctor?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: Enciodes always had contingencies in place.
I need you to rescue Arctosz and Ratatos.

attributes.content: ...I'm not sure I understand.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: ...I need a reason to act, Doctor. This goes beyond my duty to protect you.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: At this point, Enciodes has already won.
Even if Arctosz and Ratatos aren't in danger.
Kjerag is bound to undergo tectonic shifts.

attributes.content: My duty is to uphold Rhodes Island's interests, and protect you.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: And from a practical standpoint, the things going on here have nothing to do with you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Even if Enciodes wins, no harm would come to you, as you are his guest.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: From another perspective, he was the one who formed business ties with Rhodes Island, not the other two clans, let alone Kjerag as a whole.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: If anything, interfering with Enciodes's plans is more likely to threaten Rhodes Island's interests, as well as put your safety at risk.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: What I am going to do... is prevent wars and save lives.

attributes.content: Doctor, people are dying in every corner of this world.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: If you go around committed to saving people, genuinely devoting yourself to that cause, you're just going to end up overcome with guilt when you fail.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I break with a lot of Rhodes Island when I often find myself thinking that saving and protecting lives is kind of pointless.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I believe in the victories you bring, and the discernable value that comes with those victories.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Kjerag's population is in the millions. The people you are talking about aren't just a few. Not dozens, or hundreds, but tens of thousands, maybe even hundreds of thousands.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: ...Is this the victory you promised today?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: Trust me, Sharp.;Just treat it as overtime.

attributes.content: Alright. I'll see it done.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Guh...
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Ugh... Launching a sneak attack during the chaos? Don't let them get away!
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Sciurus!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Yucatan!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Hurry!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Stop!
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Out of the way!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Stand down, Yucatan of the Browntail clan.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: If you come peacefully, the Master will treat you mercifully. He has no interest in taking your lives.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: (As long as Rus can get away––)
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Gah...
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: *cough*... Rus, hurry...
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Hurry, Sciurus!
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Yucatan is still back there! And, Monch too!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You're still talking about the assassin? You idiot!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: ...She didn't do anything!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: But Yucatan... What about Yucatan?! He's my husband!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Look at what's going on around you! Yucatan sacrificed everything to save you, and you plan on jumping back into the fire?!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: So you're just going to abandon him?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If I was giving up on him, I wouldn't be fighting back!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Now stop being a damned fool!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Fine fine, I'll just keep running!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Yucatan...)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Gah... Where'd these freaks and their weird armor come from?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Sir, Enciodes's forces outnumber us too heavily! We're getting overwhelmed!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: What do we do?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: There are no cowards in the Paleroche clan!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Arctosz, stop trying to play the hero! We need to team up and cut our way out of here!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: How do you expect me to live that down?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You won't have a say in the matter if you die here!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Dammit... Damn it all!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Gulo, gather the warriors and follow me! We're going to break out of here!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Sorry about this.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: The Tschäggättä already have this place surrounded.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: You still have the option to surrender before you pass the point of no return.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Lackey of Enciodes, you speak only lies! We will fight our way out!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I would prefer if you calmed down first. You stand no chance.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: You can't run.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Actually, they can.
Who's there?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: A tall man stands in the corner at the entrance of a corridor, under the shadows of the eaves.
Behind him, several Tschäggättä, who were supposed to have the perimeter secured, lie in the corridor.
Out from the shadows strides one of the operators most familiar to Courier during the time he spent at Rhodes Island.
He knows exactly what this means.
You... Who are you?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You're... that Doctor's...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Why are you saving us?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: It's not my job to tell you things.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The exit is this way. I've already dealt with the guards outside.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Aurora, escort them out.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: You aren't getting away!
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Who's next? Try me.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Don't do anything rash! Get in formation!
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Get in formation? Just for a single person?
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: GET IN FORMATION!!
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: ...Understood.
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Very good.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Captain Sharp...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I'm so sorry.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: There's no need to apologize to me, Courier. Nothing personal.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: It's just business.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Fifteen minutes later...
Captain! You... You're injured?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: There were a lot of 'em, and Courier's blade is still pretty quick.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Captain... Courier, he...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I spared him, don't worry.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: So, what's next?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: We're all done with work over here.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: On to the next job.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: How's the Great Elder doing?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's not looking good.
attributes.name: Vine-Bear Court Medic

attributes.content: Send the Great Elder back to the Vine-Bear Court. Sir Enciodes will arrange for a special doctor.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: And, great Saintess, Sir Enciodes has invited you to return to the Vine-Bear Court and hold the coronation ceremony again after things have settled down.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enya does not resist. She knows that right now, she does not have the leeway to resist.
From a certain point onward, she has known that this was all staged farce.
And the one who set this farce in motion... was her very own brother.
He ruthlessly shattered all the mental preparations she made for this moment, as well as her vision for the future.
Even if she could take down everyone standing in front of her right now, the people would still ask her to take the position that Enciodes prepared for her in the Vine-Bear Court.
She looks all around her.
When she sees Matterhorn take notice of her gaze, she deliberately looks away.
She sees the combatants clad in modern, cutting-edge equipment tearing through the formation of Silverash warriors, escorting Arctosz and Ratatos away.
She sees the eyes of the people focused on Enciodes, like a rapt audience in front of a theater's master.
She sees the hope and fervor in their eyes.
She sees Kjarr, and she sees the person standing next to her–you.
Your eyes meet, and within them, you see sorrow, reluctance, and–– fury.
All fleeting emotions.
She finally averts her eyes, and takes a step forward.
Master! Rhodes Islanders suddenly rushed in to help Arctosz and Ratatos escape!
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You... always keep me on my toes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: All this happened in the piddling amount of time it took me to suppress Gnosis?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I must say, Rhodes Island's attack indeed surpassed my expectations. I did consider the possibility of them intervening, but underestimated their strength. This time, it is I whose plans have been forcefully disrupted.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Should I go after them?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There's no need. I still have a backup plan.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Moreover, whether or not those two die here has no bearing on what I'm going to do next.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname} must've realized as much, to make a decision like this.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What do you think comes next?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Assuming this Doctor isn't an impulsive fool, then these two still have a role to play.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: As for what comes next...
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Since you seem to hold this person in such high regard, then it isn't surprising to me that your Doctor would take advantage of this opportunity to manipulate the two clans into an obstacle for you.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I do not take the Doctor for such a flamboyant daredevil.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You seem to really 'understand' this Doctor.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's just my intuition. My intuition as a chessmaster.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: However, an outsider has rescued the heads of the Paleroche and Browntail clans...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Even I cannot fathom what one can achieve in this situation.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: So, I am most curious as to what comes next.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Of course, if what you said is true, then I eagerly await our match.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Let's just call it a day and shove those thoughts back in your head. You're the victor of today's mess.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Everyone is waiting to hear from the victor.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The scene left behind by the turmoil has not yet been cleaned up, and the people are heatedly discussing what just took place.
But as Enciodes slowly makes his way to center stage, everyone stops what they are doing, and they all turn to look at him.
The crowd is waiting for him to pen the denouement to this farce.
People of Kjerag, I am so sorry.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It pains my heart greatly to see such tragic events unfold on a holy day.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But this has given us an opportunity to see who the true traitors are in the land of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They are none other than Arctosz and Ratatos!
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They were dissatisfied by the changes brought about by my proposal to relinquish our powers, and tried to assassinate me and poison the Great Elder to seize control of all Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Without a doubt, there can be no greater blasphemy to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Though they managed to escape justice just now, I swear that this matter shall not end here.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Arctosz and Ratatos will be given fair trial, without fail!
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Though in my heart, I truly wanted to see these individuals captured and brought to justice, I had no intention of starting a conflict.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Kjerag is the land of Kjeragandr, the land of all who dwell in the icy mountains. It does not belong to me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As such, let it be known to all people of the Paleroche and Browntail clans – there shall be no civil war, as that is something we all are worried about.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Consequently, my Silverash warriors will only be deployed to protect the Vine-Bear Court. We will await the Great Elder's recovery, and then discuss Kjerag's future together with the Saintess.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But, I hope that the people of the Paleroche and Browntail clans can at least clearly see who the true enemies of Kjerag are.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I believe that we will surely find a better path forward when all our interests are aligned.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: When that time comes, we will be able to usher in a better Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.text: People start to chant Enciodes's name, with no concern for the fact that this celebration was meant to culminate in the Saintess's return to power.
From the mountain's summit and the direction of the Vine-Bear Court comes the melodious ringing of a bell.
The bell was supposed to celebrate the coronation of the Saintess, but now, it seems to herald a coming revolution.
